QuestData.Title: A Celestial Experience
QuestData.Description: Nobody is allowed into the Vale without the approval of the August Celestials. Xuen, The White Tiger, appears ready to listen to me.$b$bBut Taran Zhu of the Shado-Pan is reluctant to let the Alliance or Horde anywhere NEAR the Vale after all that's happened.$b$b<Anduin shakes his head.>$b$bMaybe you can help me make my case. Speak to the White Tiger on our behalf. Be careful! He may set a number of challenges before you...
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Xuen and complete his tests.
QuestData.CompletionText: Are you finished with the White Tiger's tasks?
QuestData.RewardText: You did it, $n!$b$bThe White Tiger has agreed to allow us to accompany the Pandaren into the Vale of Eternal Blossoms. An Alliance outpost is already set up within. Now, the hard work of cleaning up the damage can begin!
